comment: Tune kya khaya ya kiska/ki chata tha Jo kisi reporter ko chudel bol raha tha
amr:
# ::snt Tune kya khaya ya kiska/ki chata tha Jo kisi reporter ko chudel bol raha tha
(a / and
      :op1 (t / tune-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 y
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / report-01)
                  :mod (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jo"
                              :op2 "Kisi"))))
      :op2 (c / chata
            :mode expressive
            :mod (s / slash
                  :op1 (k / kiska)
                  :op2 (k2 / ki)))
      :op3 (l / laugh-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Chudel"
                        :op2 "Bol"))))
